homeRoute.title: On-Chain
homeRoute.infoPage: Join the program and recieve token rewards for every user that register and KYC on to Proton.
homeRoute.modalInfo: Enter your Proton account and email address to let you know when you have been accepted to the referral program.

aboutRoute.title: This project
aboutRoute.subtitle3: Where does the data come from?

helpRoute.title: Thank you for using our product!
helpRoute.paragraph: This project is still work in progress. Please feel free to leave upgrade suggestions, log bugs, or use the code yourself. You can also find us on Telegram or visit our website.

affiliateRoute.pageInfo: Receive XPR token rewards equal to US$10.00 for every person you invite that registers to Proton as a user and completes the KYC within 72 hours.
affiliateRoute.copy: Copy and share this URL to invite new users:
affiliateRoute.copiedMessage: Affiliate URL has been copied to your clipboard.

joinRoute.title: Join Proton!
joinRoute.infoPage: invited you to the Proton Blockchain. Signup now and earn $10 in proton cryptocurrency.
joinRoute.step2Info: Download the Proton wallet. Please use the same username as above.
joinRoute.step4Info: An admin will review your referral and approve your rewards.
joinRoute.info: Your $10 reward its in the way!
joinRoute.info2: Join the referral program, invite friends or family and obtain $10 more for each completed registration.

adminRoute.title: Administration
adminRoute.pageInfo: Affiliate approvals and payments must be performed manually and by batches.
adminRoute.addUserTitle: Enter an account and add it as active referrer.
